name: Dino (itch) (Manuel-P-L)
description:
Dino

Dino is quite a simple game, try to keep dino running as far as possible avoiding obstacles and enemies.

The game is made in the Unity graphics engine and programmed in C #, I have been developing this game in my spare time as a personal project.

Free assets that I used in the game:     Sprites:
  • Forest Tileset 
  • Dino Characters Author: @ScissorMarks 
  • Pixel Art GUI Elements
    Music:
  • Tristan Lohengrin - Happy 8bit Loop 01 ♫ NO COPYRIGHT 8-bit Music

Game development by:  Peñaloza Lopez Manuel Eduardo
